## HYTOPIA.EventRouter.emit() method

Emit an event, invoking all registered listeners for the event type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
emit<TPayload>(event: Event<TPayload>): boolean;
```

</td><td>

The event to emit.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

`true` if listeners were found and invoked, `false` otherwise.
